scripts.watch-js: npm run build-js && ./node_modules/onchange/cli.js 'js/classes/*.js' 'js/functions/*.js' 'js/components/*.js' 'js/zebedee-api/*.js' -v -- npm run build-js
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p ../../dist/legacy-assets/js && cat js/classes/*.js js/zebedee-api/*.js js/functions/*.js js/components/*.js > ../../dist/legacy-assets/js/main.js
scripts.watch-templates: npm run build-templates && ./node_modules/onchange/cli.js 'templates/*.handlebars' -v -- npm run build-templates
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && ./node_modules/onchange/cli.js 'scss/*.scss' 'scss/*/*.scss' -v -- npm run build-css
scripts.watch-misc-assets: npm run build-misc-assets && ./node_modules/onchange/cli.js 'index.html' 'assets/version.json' -v -- npm run build-misc-assets
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-templates & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-misc-assets
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-templates & npm run build-css & npm run build-misc-assets
